channel.title: [PI] Custom Crowns
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapians :) I added a custom Owner crown to my client but everytime i write in the chat this error comes up:
[code] Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawChatArea(client.java:251) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8167) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8884) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4674) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code] the code at client.java:251 : [code] modIcons[2].drawBackground(xPos + 1, yPos - 12); [/code] i added them in the cache with the cache suit :) maybe i did there something wrong? :D

item.title: [PI] Custom Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Celeron Celeron
item.description:
@Celeron wrote:

Worked Thank you bro

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Custom Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Celeron Celeron
item.description:
@Celeron wrote:

Hello Moparscapians
I added a custom Owner crown to my client but everytime i write in the chat this error comes up:

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.drawChatArea(client.java:251)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8167)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:8884)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
        at client.run(client.java:4674)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

the code at client.java:251 :

modIcons[2].drawBackground(xPos + 1, yPos - 12);

i added them in the cache with the cache suit maybe i did there something wrong?

Read full topic
